song_lyric:
曲：Qumran for East is Red
词：Quotazn+MizzNina+6wing+C-Kwan+MC KZ
Scratch: DJ T-Bone
Quotazn:
Nobody's born a winner, we learn along the way
Nobody's born a sinner, I've had my dues paid
Fast forward to the present, the past is a fable
The future might bring a label, confirm me stable
Frantic. I've had some dram, had some panic
I stick to the word, like street preachers. Manic
Depressants. Have incessant, bouts of bad weather
Calm concedes the storm, resets the pressure
The magnitude of my gratitude extends far
To those who've helped me shape my attitude. Y'all my stars
Movin' forth, local styles. They're infinite
Asia's taggin' planets everytime that she's been it!
MizzNina:
Let's take it back 2 the 6th grade
Coz this divine mizz
Is guarented ta make u love it or hate
Coz I be shootin words and teachin lessons
Basics 4 adolescents on how hip hop was made
Class 101
It's not about the parties or the riches
Or getting' high of the fame will give ya glitches
Or getting' vicious
Won't let ya get 2 where u at
So my only wish is that 2 choose a path in life 2 follow
And live it up like there's no tomorrow
Coz ya got 2 know who u are and where u are roots at
From the four corners of hip hop, Yo
We combine and interact
Everybody follow tha snare
东南亚既口水佬又讲紧咩
everybody follow tha snare
东南亚既口水佬又讲紧咩

check one 第一步听一下边一队叫农夫

check three 试下Rap下有无问题

唔惊佢对住你手指指
背住你话你屎
话你人玩又玩
喂'十月都系拜年时
你多左几旧鱼
有心唔怕迟
总之讲既就系咁多
继续 microphone
check four check check check check check 左三四次
我话试mic一二'唔讲日本字
唔好意思香港又真系好似无乜 MC
我系其中一个'好彩dd个d
可以出CD
不过碟唔系卖梗
我唔会收埋枝mic白等
预左打真军
妹妹仔唔lum

MC KZ:
我由屯门东舟车劳动咁走到去港岛西
都只不过系为左搵份兼职赚钱买支靓mic
找返个几鸡
爱黎买个包返屋企餵妻
仲点会有时间北上消费 (Captain:按摩脚板底)
协合就系我既生活
生活就系我既协合
你唔好又乜乜又七七
我都唔知你翕乜
香港d口水佬既生活就系咁硬掘掘
系玄学角度我地称之为硬掘
协合则来'不合则去
我唔爱吹波波
我好清醒绝对无饮醉
每日有潮涨就一定有潮退
但系我既协合生理高潮系唔会减退
唔会随时间走左去
多口讲句
卤水鸡翼d汁乜唔系叫做卤水
四五十岁出黎摆个d仲唔系叫做老举
由此推算落去我既生财工具仲唔系呢把咀
